title: Contemporary Gated House For Rent
map_address: 6390 South University Blvd Centennial CO 80121 near S.University&Arapahoe
posting_body: ['•\tYear Built: 1999', '•\tNEWLY Remodeled', '•\tHeating:', 'Forced Air', '•\tCooling: Central Air', '•\tGarage: 2 Cars and plenty parking space in the front yard w. a circular driveway', '•\tLot: 0.35 Acres', '•\tTotal sq.', 'ft. above ground: 2,184', 'Don’t miss the opportunity to live in one of the most recognizable houses on South University Blvd.', 'This contemporary house located on 0.35 Acres, has 8 feet high concrete, stucco walls, two cars garage.', 'Drive through the gate and you will be greeted with a beautiful fountain, multi level landscaping and ample space to park on a reinforced concrete circular driveway.', 'This two level style house has an open floor plan with two independent and separate entrances on each floor.', 'Second floor has a high-vaulted ceiling, lots of natural light, and open concept living area.', 'The kitchen is the heart of the home looking directly out to the treetops with new cabinets, stove and microwave, big island, and access to a huge deck.', 'This house has European-style large bathroom, laundry, and walk-in closet, big 1 bedroom with a gas fireplace.', 'Entire second floor is covered with 24”x24” white porcelain tile.', 'Windows are extra large, with triple pane low E glass provide very quite atmosphere inside the house and remarkable views of the mountains.', 'All rooms have ceiling fans in addition to central air conditioning.', 'First floor is a fully finished apartment with a separate entrance; has a generously sized living room, two bedrooms, den/office, kitchen with all appliances, including washer/dryer.', 'The location is priceless.', 'Directly across the street are Goodson Park, recreation Center with fitness club and a pool.', ' Highline Canal Trails is next to the property.', 'Just minutes away are Trader Joe’s, TJ Maxx, Strip mall and South Glenn Mall.', 'Application is Free.', 'Tenant responsible to provide updated Credit Score from Bank and public Criminal record.']
